## type Todo

```go
type Todo struct {
    Name        string `json:"name" yaml:"name" jsonschema:"minLength=3"`
    Description string `json:"description" yaml:"description"`
    Done        bool   `json:"done" yaml:"done"`
    Notes       []Note `json:"notes" yaml:"notes"`
}
```
